text: This character has been touched by Slaanesh. A Gift of Slaanesh is given any time an army loses a battle to a Slaanesh [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or is successfully targeted by a Slaanesh [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero.
